General.Name: Freeport Resources Inc
General.Description: Freeport Resources Inc., a junior mineral exploration company, engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in Papua New Guinea. The company holds a flagship property Yandera copper project located in Papua New Guinea. Freeport Resources Inc. was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6

1.Title: CFO & Director
